meta.job_title: Senior Principal Consultant Senior Developer, SFDC

duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and define a technical approach to solve problems utilizing Salesforce features and capabilities.
Identify and resolve violations of best practices and limitations breach in code.
Independently program complex solutions and manage junior developer timelines and deliveries.
Define and train the team about best practices and ensure compliance with project guidelines.
Encourage and support team members during UAT/Production deployments.
Mentor and lead junior team members in Salesforce technology, Force.com, Integration Technologies, and Salesforce best practices.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field (Master's preferred)
